department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: cylindrical container with conical cover; plant fiber base with blue, white and gold beads on exterior with zigzag motifs (beads may be on a removable sleeve); zigzag and stripe motifs on beads on cover; four bead strands on point of cover--blue, red, green and white
markings: sewn on rim of container, on tag: [FRO2 0720]
title: Basket with cover
